Name: Long Beach Iced Tea
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: Coffee liqueur, cranberry juice and lime juice combine to give this 4 spirit charged drink a chocolate-like flavour.
Nutrition: One serving of Long Beach Iced Tea contains 255 calories
